mapper.select: SELECT date_format( str_to_date( `sale_contract`.`sign_date`, '%m/%d/%Y' ), '%Y-%m' ) AS `sign_date`, sum( `sale_contract`.`contract_amount` ) AS `total_contract_amount`,( sum( `sale_order`.`order_amount` ) - sum( `sale_return`.`return_amount` )) AS `total_sale_amount` FROM ((( `sale_customer` JOIN `sale_order` ON (( `sale_customer`.`id` = `sale_order`.`customer_id` ))) JOIN `sale_contract` ON (( `sale_order`.`order_no` = `sale_contract`.`order_no` ))) LEFT JOIN `sale_return` ON (( `sale_contract`.`contract_no` = `sale_return`.`contract_no` ))) GROUP BY date_format( str_to_date( `sale_contract`.`sign_date`, '%m/%d/%Y' ), '%Y-%m')
